strapiEvent.name: Frisco Inferno BBQ Competition
strapiEvent.description:
Take a trip to Flavor Town during the 8th Annual Frisco Inferno, the Official BBQ Competition of Bikes, Blues & BBQ Motorcycle Rally, hosted in Downtown Rogers on Sep 23. 

  • Smoke the Competition: Up to 30 teams of four may enter the competition and compete for The Judges’ Choice Awards, including trophies and cash prizes in two categories of smoked meat — Pork and Turkey.
  • The Meat Sweats: Not a chef, but have strong opinions about flavor? This year features a VIP Pit Pass, which includes the opportunity to taste all the competing teams' work and vote for the People’s Choice Award.

Learn more about Frisco Inferno, register to compete, or buy tickets HERE.
